src:
Ništa od velikog okršaja, Nadal predao polufinale
02 Nov 2019, 16:53 by Darko
Od dugo očekivanog finala Mastersa u Parizu između Novaka Đokovića i Rafaela Nadala neće biti ništa.
Španski teniser i od ponedeljka svetski broj 1, predao je polufinalni meč protiv Denisa Šapovalova zbog povrede, objavili su organizatori turnira u pariskom Bersiju.
Đoković će tako u nedelju u finalu igrati protiv 20-godišnjeg Kanađanina, sa kojim se do sada tri puta sastajao.
Sva tri meča Novak i Šapovalov su odigrali ove godine, na Australijan Openu, Mastersu u Rimu i Mastersu u Šangaju. Sva tri puta bolji je bio srpski teniser koji je Šapovalovu prepustio samo jedan set do sada i to u njihovom prvom okršaju.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
None of the big brawl, Nadal handed the semi-finals
02 Nov 2019, 15:53 by Darko
There will be nothing between the long-awaited Masters final in Paris between Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal.
The Spanish tennis player and Monday's world No.1 has handed over a semi-final match against Dennis Chapovalov due to injury, the organizers of the Paris-Bersi tournament have announced.
Djokovic will play Sunday against the 20-year-old Canadian in the finals, with whom he has met three times so far.
All three matches Novak and Shapovalov have played this year, at the Australian Open, Masters in Rome and Masters in Shanghai. All three times better was the Serbian tennis player, who gave Shapovalov only one set so far, in their first round.
